website_summaries.verdict: This bread box ticks just about every box with an unbeatable combination of style, convenience, and affordability.
pros: design blends well with any decor
Cool, dark interior keeps food fresh
Good size and capacity with vent holes

customer_reviews.title: Sleek and functional!
customer_reviews.text: I received one that had been bent on the side and the door wouldn't slide closed. I submitted a damage claim on Amazon and they sent me a replacement immediately as well as a return shipping label for the damaged item. They didn't charge my card a second time for the replacement, I had only to return the damaged one within 30 days or they would have. That was more than fair and I love that this closes by weighted door verses some sort of magnet or catch. Nothing to go wrong with this one! It's very sleek and is exactly as pictured. I would absolutely buy this item again.
customer_reviews.author: Kim.Eichelberger

customer_reviews.title: You Get What You Pay For... sometimes...
customer_reviews.text: We saw this breadbox posted as "best buy" so we went with it. It arrived in a flimsy off-the-store-shelf type of box... NOT in a secured shipping box. So, I shouldn't have been surprised. The flimsy sheet metal breadbox had a dent in it about the size of a golf ball. We returned the item for a credit and then went online to pay more (6 times more) for a sturdier, much nicer bread box. MORAL OF THE STORY: You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Almost Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: It sits well and holds a good bit. The only thing that kept me back one star was it is a bit flimsy. I wish it had a little more structure to it. It still looks great on my counter and serves the purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Elynoon

customer_reviews.title: Ended up at Goodwill for some other sucker
customer_reviews.text: Looks really nice and possibly if they had made it out of something besides PAPER THIN STAINLESS STEEL FROM CHINA it may have worked. Incredibly thin, I can see my hand through it !
customer_reviews.author: stampy

customer_reviews.title: Problem with product may be shipper
customer_reviews.text: The seller ships this item in the original lightweight paper package. No padding. No cardboard box. I will be returning this product for a refund as I have already returned one which was damaged for a replacement and the replacement showed up damaged as well. It looks like a nice, not so sturdy, bread box. Very lightweight.
customer_reviews.author: April Wright

customer_reviews.title: Looks alright but very thin metal
customer_reviews.text: Very very thin metal it looks good on the counter but when I got mine it was all bent and wouldn’t close, I had to bend back to shape and it works but I was disappointed when I received it. I would have sent it back but I’ve read that amazon will cancel accounts with too many returns.
customer_reviews.author: RayRay82

customer_reviews.title: A bit rickety for kids use.
customer_reviews.text: Looks great but the metal is thin and the sliding lid is “rickety”, for lack of a better word. Any bread I put in it molds quickly. So right now it sits on the counter looking great but not being used.
customer_reviews.author: wchp1963

customer_reviews.title: Nice inexpensive item
customer_reviews.text: Very nice for the price. I love mine and it’s just the right size.. recommend item to others if you’re looking for something nice and inexpensive..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome looking product but a bit fragile
customer_reviews.text: I really like this bed bin but ithe stainless steel is so thin that is a bit fragile. Almost with any bump it gets dented. Besides that I love how it looks in my kitchen and keeps my bread fresh.
customer_reviews.author: E. Walters

customer_reviews.title: Poorly packaged, flimsy, easily dented
customer_reviews.text: Super thin and easily dented. Arrived in the breadbox's original box with shipping label. Very little packing cushion, so it was bound to get dented before arrival. Also, mine had weird turquoise paint and scuffs on the side of the item as if it had been preowned. I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: For almost $30 the door isn’t very smooth operating. Going to send back.
customer_reviews.author: Cavan

customer_reviews.title: Big capacitu
customer_reviews.text: I love this. Looks really nice on the counter. Good capacity. Holds a lot of bread and buns
customer_reviews.author: L. Carpenter

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again.
customer_reviews.text: Fits 2 loafs of bread. Looks very nice in my kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly O'Brien

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I would not buy this. It's flimsy, it came completely broken and dented. The door is smashed in.
customer_reviews.author: ana nelson

customer_reviews.title: Great looking and versatile
customer_reviews.text: Holds two good size loaves of bread or bagels. It looks good on the counter and very eat to clean and open.
customer_reviews.author: Kathyshops

customer_reviews.title: Pesky product sticker
customer_reviews.text: Everything looks good except so not put sticker on item as it will not clean off even when completely peeled off. Maybe put sticker underneath where it doesn't matter. Besides that it functions and looks good. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn Grullon

customer_reviews.title: Functions fine,  cosmetically imperfect
customer_reviews.text: Unit arrived with the surface marred right in the front in a very conspicuous spot. Other than that it is great!
customer_reviews.author: S M

customer_reviews.title: 21st century!
customer_reviews.text: Modern looking and stylish! Nice addition toward our kitchen upgrade!
customer_reviews.author: PANDAMAN

customer_reviews.title: It's a nice bread box
customer_reviews.text: The bread box is bigger than I expected, but it's nice.
customer_reviews.author: Tee

customer_reviews.title: Very poorly made. Not quality metal. Have to ...
customer_reviews.text: Very poorly made. Not quality metal. Have to be careful each time we open it that it doesn’t come off it’s track. Light as a feather. Thin thin metal.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stainless Steel Breadbox
customer_reviews.text: Looks sturdy and fits into our kitchen perfectly. I'll update if anything changes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Price
customer_reviews.text: This was a great buy. Looks good on my counter
customer_reviews.author: M. H. Cea

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is a nice, well made item, however it doesn't hold two standard sized loaves of bread.
customer_reviews.author: B. Kruse

customer_reviews.title: Breadbox
customer_reviews.text: Fits nicely on my kitchen counter. Just the right size for the two of us and our need for a breadbox.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Sears

customer_reviews.title: No good around kids
customer_reviews.text: The metal underneath the rubber guards that easily come off is razor sharp! Watch out, I cut myself good on them.
customer_reviews.author: Koby Cox

customer_reviews.title: Very thin and easy to be damaged
customer_reviews.text: When pulling out of box after delivery the jinx looked like it had been through a fight all dinged up everywhere. Very thing metal and not lo g lasting
customer_reviews.author: Carey Canedy

customer_reviews.title: Will not hold 2 loaves of bread
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking bread box, it is not big enough to hold 2 loaves of bread as stated. Wish that it was higher. I have one loaf of bread and it will not hold another full loaf. That is why I gave it four stars.
customer_reviews.author: Dolores Bonner

customer_reviews.title: Find another product
customer_reviews.text: Very light and the door was not aligned right. I had to bend it to make it straight and now it won’t open and close smoothly
customer_reviews.author: Rodney Norris

customer_reviews.title: Functionality
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful........just what I was looking for. My kitchen is small and it fits perfectly on top of my microwave. Nice and deep, holds all my bread and buns. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Holds a lot of bread
customer_reviews.text: The counter top looks a lot neater with the bread inside the bin. It can hold two loaves of bread and a package of English muffins.
customer_reviews.author: Guitarpatty

customer_reviews.title: Looks  great
customer_reviews.text: It looks great in my kitchen fits just enough bread, buns and bagels All at the same time
customer_reviews.author: mara kovalenko

customer_reviews.title: flimsy
customer_reviews.text: When I received it, the top had a big dent in it, and also the roll-up lid. I didn't realize it was so flimsy. I've sent it back and will order a different kind.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Horton

customer_reviews.title: Product box and product are damaged , crushed.
customer_reviews.text: This package arrived severely damaged. I don’t think it’s fair that I have to go out of my way to shop it back. It’s so inconvenient. Who has time for this?
customer_reviews.author: Visitor

customer_reviews.title: Great bread box
customer_reviews.text: I love the look. It makes mess free. I used to have bread in the counter top and looked messy. Now it looks much better.
customer_reviews.author: karilu ruiz-duran

customer_reviews.title: Okay replacement
customer_reviews.text: Bought it to replace a red one that was similar.. This one was more flimsy, but acceptable.
customer_reviews.author: Olivesmom

customer_reviews.title: Damaged upon arrival
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived extremely damaged and unusable. Will be sent back for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Camden Crumly

customer_reviews.title: Very functional
customer_reviews.text: Very functional. Looks nice on the counter. Keeps bread safe from the dog.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Howard

customer_reviews.title: Returned it.
customer_reviews.text: Sorry it had a big dent on one side, so I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Cathye

customer_reviews.title: Could be better
customer_reviews.text: Not the best sonce is was wonbly and finish was ot the best. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Dent
customer_reviews.text: The item arrived with a significant dent on one end. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Roomy!
customer_reviews.text: Nice and deep with lots of room for multiple loafs.
customer_reviews.author: Irene

customer_reviews.title: Bread Box
customer_reviews.text: I love my bread box. I wish however, that the stainless steel was easier to keep fingerprints off.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Roomy
customer_reviews.text: Serves the purpose I bought it for,,,,,very roomy,,,,material is a bit on the light side/not super sturdy
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Sticky problem.
customer_reviews.text: This bread bin is large and retro looking. Why does the seller insist on using Sellotape to keep it closed for delivery. I am having a terrible time trying to get the glue off the bin. Even painters' tape would be better or a ribbon of cellophane, so that there is no need to put glue anywhere near the stainless steel. I am seriously considering returning this product, if I cannot get the glue off. Solutions welcome! In addition, this bread bin does not so much keep the bread fresh as keep the kitchen counters tidy.
customer_reviews.author: G. Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great and looks great. Not heavy duty, but it gets the job done. We love it.
customer_reviews.author: james bridges

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Gave it a gift to my Dad. Large capacity that fits two loaves of bread
customer_reviews.author: Auxiliadora Pronio

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I used this breadbox to store bread. Not as much space as I thought but it was workable. After 2 months it started to rust. Tossed it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Functional
customer_reviews.text: I like the look, but not the way it closes
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Just got this item and there's a dent on the top I'm adding a photo later
customer_reviews.author: Marshall Ferguson

customer_reviews.title: Item arrived with a lot of damage. Ultimately item ...
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived with a lot of damage. Ultimately item could not be used so repacked it immediately and sent it back.
customer_reviews.author: Lakeisha Coleman

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy
customer_reviews.text: Complete trash came damaged and construction very flimsy had to give it a star to write this review
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is great. Save a lot a money not having the bread to go moldy to fast
customer_reviews.author: G.M.

customer_reviews.title: Don’t bother - arrived dented like everyone else.
customer_reviews.text: Should have listened to the other reviews. Arrived with one side dented in.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I wanted something to put the different types of bread ...
customer_reviews.text: I wanted something to put the different types of bread that I buy. This bread box matches my kitchen appliances. It is well made.
customer_reviews.author: Judith King

customer_reviews.title: Got it out of the box and it looked like this.
customer_reviews.text: Not stainless steel. Cheap cheap cheap. Got it out of the box and it looked like this.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Nevins

customer_reviews.title: Got this for my mother for a gift. She ...
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my mother for a gift. She loves it can fit 3 smaller loaves of bread in it.
customer_reviews.author: Buffy

customer_reviews.title: Too light, edges a bit sharp
customer_reviews.text: Not ideal, returned the item and yet to receive credit from Amazon
customer_reviews.author: Denzie W Sinclair

customer_reviews.title: Too "tinny"..... Not the quality ...
customer_reviews.text: Too "tinny".....Not the quality I expected. rattled when I tried roll down the door.
customer_reviews.author: Midge McGoldrick

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful addition to match my stainless steel appliances.
customer_reviews.author: Darnel Burrows

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The breadbox is flimsy. Not at all sturdy. You have to be careful opening and shutting the cover. Also much shinier than I thought stainless steel would be. The measurements in the ad were different than on the box.
customer_reviews.author: Connie

customer_reviews.title: Arrived Dented
customer_reviews.text: Opened the box on xmas and the side was all dented. It was embarassing. The thickness of the stainless steel is more like that of a soda can. Auto-door opens nicely. Size is a little small but works for 1 loaf and a smidge more.
customer_reviews.author: shopping101

customer_reviews.title: Please buy something else.
customer_reviews.text: The bread box i received was warped. When placed on the counter, it rocks. The top of the bread box looks uneven above the door. Also, I feel it is cheaply made, very lightweight -not at all the quality product I was expecting. Even if this breadbox had no physical defects. I would still return it.
customer_reviews.author: Sherita Burt

customer_reviews.title: Polder Deluxe Stainless Steel Bread Box
customer_reviews.text: It is not too large for the counter, but has lots of space inside for 2 full loaves of bread. Great purchase for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Leah

customer_reviews.title: It'll Do:)
customer_reviews.text: It is very simple. Nothing to rave about. I love this black trimming, it adds some sort of details to all the stainless steel. Really good box if you need something that looks good in the kitchen , wipes clean and closes well.
customer_reviews.author: Tactive

customer_reviews.title: Too flimsy for my taste
customer_reviews.text: Tinny and flimsy; will replace at some point, but will do for the time being.
customer_reviews.author: William Leahy

customer_reviews.title: GREAT Seller awesome product for a great price
customer_reviews.text: Love the item very professionally packed, GREAT PRICE super fast shipping A+++++++++++ seller deff will be buying more of seller. THANK YOU
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not quite as deep as I wanted, but I bought two to accomadate our needs
customer_reviews.text: Nice stainless steel bread box. No fingerprints show on the surface; easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce A Stenger

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful bread box
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and roomy I got a good deal because it supposedly had two small scratches, but I haven't seen them. I would recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: Sally Broessel

customer_reviews.title: Great Counter Addition
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking product. We store all our bread products in this box and have made the counter a much better organized area,
customer_reviews.author: Michael Rosselle

customer_reviews.title: Stainless Steel Bread Box
customer_reviews.text: Met all my expectations. Would highly recommend it to anyone (especially where there is limited counter space). Would also make a great gift.
customer_reviews.author: Barb Lucas

customer_reviews.title: Deluxe? Try "Cheap"
customer_reviews.text: I decided to return this about 45 seconds after opening it. The metal is thin and flimsy, and the construction very poor (e.g., little plastic end guards cheap looking and loose). Also, it was a bit lopsided, so it did not sit squarely on my counter. Maybe it works fine. Who knows. The design and manufacture were so poor, I didn't keep it long enough to find out.
customer_reviews.author: Kenny O.

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Breadbox
customer_reviews.text: This bread box looks nice, but it is very cheap and flimsy. I will never buy this product again. Do not waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: ToniL

customer_reviews.title: Don't get the stainless, get a color. They're stronger.
customer_reviews.text: I previously purchased the blue model and was very happy with it. My daughter took it so I had to get another. Compared to the blue, this one seems flimsy and I realize the blue coating added extra strength to the door. Wish I knew this before.
customer_reviews.author: L. Shortt

customer_reviews.title: My product was all banged up.
customer_reviews.text: Both sides were dented in. So I’m assuming it was dropped several times but I received my purchase. The dents will not come out. Very disappointed. It’s big and great for storage, the cosmetics of my bread box is awful 😡
customer_reviews.author: Miss Diva

customer_reviews.title: Generously-sized, sturdy bread box!
customer_reviews.text: We'd struggled with bread wrappers all over the counter, and cruddy boxes that were way too small in the past. This one is nice and large (see our picture for how much it fits), attractive, and well-made!
customer_reviews.author: Straight Outta the Suburbs

customer_reviews.title: A simple Bread Box
customer_reviews.text: If I have ever seen a bread box in person at a retail store, I must not remember it, or no one really carries these anymore. I was tired of having various bread and bread like items scattered across my counters. We had been putting the bread in the microwave as a temporary solution to get it out of the way, but that is such a hassle when you need to use the microwave. So I bought a dedicated bread box! The door slides up and down very easily, it can fit 1 loaf of bread with various other breads as well. The brushed silver really compliments my kitchen set up of black and black and silver appliances.
customer_reviews.author: Pablo

customer_reviews.title: Piece of junk
customer_reviews.text: The base has no support and it just wobbles around on the counter top. The door worked one time using one hand and then it was getting stuck and I had to use two hands to open it. Total piece of junk and definitely not worth the almost $30 I paid for it. Already printed my return shipping label...
customer_reviews.author: orcaspam

customer_reviews.title: Came smashed and unusable
customer_reviews.text: The product was completely smashed in, you couldn't even open it. Both the product box and the shipping box were not damaged at all. The metal on this bread box is ridiculously thin and cheaply made. I returned it today.
customer_reviews.author: Justine603

customer_reviews.title: Unnecessarily small
customer_reviews.text: It's too small to hold much more than an ordinary size loaf of bread. What if you have a bag of cookies to include as well? I found they won't fit.
customer_reviews.author: Philip Coates

customer_reviews.title: Nice, big bread box!
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love this bread box. It holds 2 loaves of bread east and a bag of bagels. Gets them off the counter and put away in an attractive container.
customer_reviews.author: pjlowens

customer_reviews.title: Super Cheap Box, Do not Buy
customer_reviews.text: This box was horrible. I had to return it the day it arrived. It came slightly damaged (small dents) and looked gross just from my fingerprints removing it out of the box. Poor workmanship (very, very cheap) and would not recommend at all.
customer_reviews.author: La Bella

customer_reviews.title: Great bread box if you’re looking for a bread envelope
customer_reviews.text: Well, it’s a good thing my husband is a blacksmith and can beat this bread box back into shape. Looks like it originally would have held unsquashed loaves of bread, I guess I should be happy with this smashed bread box since my loaves don’t rise that evenly. Maybe don’t use the metal bread box as a soccer ball prior to shipping?
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this bread box! Looks good. Keeps everything fresh for much longer than not using a bread box. Super satisfied with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Darshell

customer_reviews.title: Sleek and clean-looking. Perfect size.
customer_reviews.text: I just updated my kitchen. Very clean black and white look. This has sleek lines and a good size. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Not as roomy as I would like but for the price its a very good buy
customer_reviews.author: Travis Westmoreland

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend this Bread container
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality, very good size, the stainless steel has a nice finish. Would buy again, and recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Monica Ferreira

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: Its large so I like it I can fit my tortillas bagged and a loaf of bread. But I think the price was kinda high.
customer_reviews.author: ALEXIS

customer_reviews.title: Unbelievably cheap...terrible product
customer_reviews.text: I just received this unit and it came damaged. Actually i won't even say damaged because the box was perfectly in tact but the product is so cheap the right side of the door popped out of the rivet during shipping. I can't believe they charge $30 for this. Honestly it's not even worth $10. The metal is so thin and the thing barely holds itself together. Everything is cheap about this item, including the plastic edging that is already coming off as well. Beware of this item, do not buy!!!
customer_reviews.author: bearsfan34

customer_reviews.title: Big storage
customer_reviews.text: Larger than expected but really nice storage. Looks like quality product. Opens and shuts easily. Matches stainless steal kitchen appliances nicely
customer_reviews.author: CD

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and useful
customer_reviews.text: This bread box keeps my home-made bread fresh and crispy and looks stylish enough for me to display it on the kitchen counter.
customer_reviews.author: M Frasier

customer_reviews.title: Powder 216204 bread bin
customer_reviews.text: Very neat bread box. Holds 2 loaves of bread, a Package of bagels and a package of English muffins
customer_reviews.author: Jim D.  Miller

customer_reviews.title: Very nice product
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I have used this Deluxe Bread Bin for a week, and it is really nice-looking, spacious, and opens and closes with ease. We have enjoyed using this product so far, and we have no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: A. Peterson

customer_reviews.title: I purchased this for my new home and love it! Larger than I thought it would be
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my new home and love it! Larger than I thought it would be. I holds 2 loafs of bread...could probably hold more.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: This thing is absolute rubbish. It wasn’t level it rocked on the counter and was crooked. The black rubber seal aroundbhe edges was bowing and crooked. I could have made this by hand with more precision. Waste of my time and money. Returned it immediately .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, Stylish, Awesome Purchase!!!
customer_reviews.text: This "Totally" fits right in with the rest of my Stainless Steel Kitchen Appliances. I love it, and definitely glad that I made this purchase. My husband also likes it, and its big enough to hold the items that we want to keep fresh but covered and/or out of sight!! Love this and would recommend to family and friends!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Wallgren

customer_reviews.title: Arrived damaged!
customer_reviews.text: I don’t have a problem with the item personally, but the way the item arrived is terrible! Amazon/ups shipping ruined a Christmas present.
customer_reviews.author: Purebred

customer_reviews.title: Not too bad
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than I thought, but works for my needs. I did expect it to be a little better quality, seems cheaply made but again, it'll work.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Miller

customer_reviews.title: Not as sturdy as it looks.
customer_reviews.text: I had this about 2 weeks before the door stuck and while trying to get it unstuck the door bent. Looks nice though.
customer_reviews.author: compulsive shopper

customer_reviews.title: Very cheap looking. Doesn’t hold as much as expected ...
customer_reviews.text: Very cheap looking. Doesn’t hold as much as expected. Also side had a dent in sjipping.
customer_reviews.author: Hummingbird24

customer_reviews.title: Really Pleased With This Purchase
customer_reviews.text: An incredibly handsome, quality, and utilitarian product. I bought this as warehouse purchase; one for me, and then one for my daughter. Wonderful value.
customer_reviews.author: bigboppar

product_meta.title: Polder Deluxe Countertop Bread Bin & Storage
product_meta.description:
Color:Stainless SteelKeep baked goods fresh with this sturdy Deluxe Bread Bin from Polder. It has a stainless steel construction with a protective plastic trim to prevents scratches while adding a touch of style. Venting holes keep bread fresh longer and the roll-top opens cleanly and closes tightly. Wipe it down with a simple, soft cloth. This large capacity box measures 17" long x 11" wide x 7" high, offering plenty of room to hold your favorite bread and baked goods. Polder Solves Problems…We are the solutions resource, making items for everyday living throughout the home. We focus on taking universal daily tasks, studying and applying our user-centered design philosophy to create products that are useful, beautiful and better. Whether it’s kitchen prep & storage, home organization & laundry or personal care items, we are passionate about products, design and the evolution of how people use products in the home every day. We’re also about quality and customer satisfaction and work to make items that last and perform to deliver on their intended promise. Polder…life.style.solutions.

AMAZON.COM

This large capacity box measures 17" long x 11" wide x 7" high, offering plenty of room to hold your favorite bread and baked goods. feature_bullets: LARGE CAPACITY generously sized bread bin holds up 2 full loaves of bread. Also store muffins, bagels, cookies and other fresh baked goods.
ROLL TOP LID smoothly opens and closes and provides a sleek look
VENTING HOLES keep bread fresh and help prevent mold by allowing air flow
PROTECTIVE PLASTIC TRIM keeps countertops safe from scuffs and scratches
BPA FREE brushed stainless steel construction
